app.title: SeftecHub
app.description: Enterprise DeFi Access Platform | Global B2B Trade & Finance

hero.title: Transform Your Business with Advanced Technology
hero.subtitle: Unlock enterprise-grade DeFi access, AI-powered marketplace solutions, and intelligent business automation in one comprehensive platform.
hero.trade_part2: Trade with a Trusted AI-Powered Marketplace
hero.trade_title: Revolutionizing Global Trade with a Trusted AI-Powered Marketplace
hero.trade_subtitle: Trade with Trust, Pay with Confidence. Connect with verified businesses worldwide, transact securely, and access financing solutions all in one platform.
hero.badge_trade: The Future of Secure B2B Trade & Vendor Payments

lack_of_trust.title: Lack of Trust
lack_of_trust.description: Businesses struggle with unverified buyers and sellers, making it difficult to establish reliable trading relationships.

payment_uncertainty.title: Payment Uncertainty
payment_uncertainty.description: Delayed or fraudulent transactions limit business growth and create unnecessary financial risks.

manual_processes.title: Manual Trade Processes
manual_processes.description: Slow onboarding, negotiation, and contract execution waste valuable time and resources.

financing_gaps.title: Trade Financing Gaps
financing_gaps.description: Lack of trade financing options for SMEs limits their ability to take on larger opportunities.

cross_border.title: Cross-Border Challenges
cross_border.description: SMEs face high fees & delays in international payments, hindering global expansion.

market_access.title: Limited Market Access
market_access.description: Difficulty finding and connecting with relevant global trading partners.

verified_marketplace.title: Verified B2B Marketplace
verified_marketplace.description: Connect with pre-verified businesses, access company profiles, and build trust through transparent ratings and reviews.

secure_payments.title: Secure Payment Solutions
secure_payments.description: Multi-currency transactions with escrow protection, instant settlements, and fraud prevention.

smart_contracts.title: Smart Contract Automation
smart_contracts.description: Automated workflows for orders, invoices, and agreements with blockchain-backed security.

trade_finance.title: Integrated Trade Finance
trade_finance.description: Access working capital, invoice factoring, and supply chain financing tailored for SMEs.

global_reach.title: Global Payment Network
global_reach.description: Low-cost international transfers with real-time FX rates and multi-currency wallets.

ai_matching.title: AI-Powered Matching
ai_matching.description: Find ideal trading partners with intelligent recommendations based on your business needs.

products.inventory_desc: AI-powered inventory tracking with real-time analytics and automated reordering capabilities.
products.payment_desc: Multi-currency payment processing with fraud detection and global compliance.
products.trade_desc: Streamline letters of credit, guarantees, and trade documentation with blockchain verification.
products.defi_desc: Institutional-grade DeFi portfolio management with risk assessment and automated strategies.

performance.title: Performance Dashboard
performance.subtitle: Real-time system performance and reliability metrics

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Businesses around the world trust our platform to drive their financial decision-making and strategic planning.
testimonials.label: Client Success

sarah_johnson.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah_johnson.quote: The AI assistant feature has revolutionized our decision-making process. We've seen a 30% increase in operational efficiency since implementation.

michael_chen.name: Michael Chen
michael_chen.quote: The platform's ability to analyze market trends and provide strategic recommendations has been invaluable for our international expansion.

aisha_patel.name: Aisha Patel
aisha_patel.quote: The customizable dashboard has given us unprecedented visibility into our financial performance. The AI insights are spot-on and actionable.

robert_martinez.name: Robert Martinez
robert_martinez.quote: The predictive analytics have helped us anticipate market shifts and adjust our strategy accordingly. It's like having a financial advisor available 24/7.

regions.title: Global Presence
regions.subtitle: Regions We Cover
regions.description: Our platform supports businesses across multiple regions, providing localized insights and global perspectives.

value_propositions.title: Our Value Propositions
value_propositions.subtitle: Empowering Your Business Growth
value_propositions.description: Discover how our comprehensive platform can transform your business operations and drive unprecedented success.

ai_matching.title: AI-Powered Smart Matching
ai_matching.description: Our advanced algorithms connect you with the perfect business partners based on your needs, preferences, and transaction history.

cross_border.title: Cross-Border Sourcing & Export
cross_border.description: Connect with global suppliers and buyers, facilitating international trade across borders with ease and confidence.

vendor_financing.title: Embedded Vendor Financing
vendor_financing.description: Access instant credit for inventory purchases with competitive interest rates between 4% to 6%, improving your cash flow.

direct_access.title: Direct Vendor Access
direct_access.description: Manufacturers can promote products directly to high-potential vendors through targeted advertising and bulk special offers.

marketplace.title: Marketplace for Local & Global Sourcing
marketplace.description: Access international brands and export locally produced goods, expanding your business reach globally.

ai_advisor.title: AI Business Advisor
ai_advisor.description: Our intelligent assistant analyzes financial data, market trends, and operations to provide strategic recommendations that optimize performance and enhance profitability.

business_plan.title: Business Plan Review & Drafting
business_plan.description: Comprehensive business plan creation, review, and strategic planning services powered by AI to ensure your business strategy is optimized for success.

cashflow.title: In-Depth Cashflow Management
cashflow.description: Advanced cashflow analytics, forecasting, and management tools to maintain healthy liquidity and optimize working capital.

multi_country.title: Multi-Country Business Registration
multi_country.description: Complete business incorporation and regulatory alignment support for US, UK & EU markets - exclusive for Pro users.

compliance.title: Global Compliance & Risk Analytics
compliance.description: Highly tuned, context-aware AI for global business practices, risk analytics, and regulatory compliance suited for growing businesses.

defi_banking.title: DeFi & Open Banking Integration
defi_banking.description: Leverage decentralized finance and open banking solutions, bringing your business to the future of financial technology.

instant_settlement.title: Instant Settlement for Verified Businesses
instant_settlement.description: Lightning-fast payment settlements available exclusively for fully verified businesses, ensuring optimal cash flow management.

intuitive_dashboard.title: Intuitive Dashboard
intuitive_dashboard.description: Get a 360-degree view of your business with our intuitive dashboard that presents all critical information at a glance.
intuitive_dashboard.details: Our dashboard consolidates your key metrics, recent activities, and important notifications in a clean, organized interface designed for maximum productivity.

realtime_analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
realtime_analytics.description: Monitor key performance indicators and track trends in real-time to make data-driven decisions.
realtime_analytics.details: Access up-to-the-minute data on sales, inventory, customer behavior, and market trends through interactive charts and visualizations that help you spot opportunities and challenges instantly.

customizable_reports.title: Customizable Reports
customizable_reports.description: Generate detailed reports tailored to your specific needs for deeper business insights.
customizable_reports.details: Create, schedule, and share reports with flexible parameters, custom metrics, and multiple export options to support your decision-making process and stakeholder communications.

user_friendly.title: User-Friendly Interface
user_friendly.description: Navigate with ease and access the information you need quickly with our intuitive design.
user_friendly.details: Enjoy a clean, responsive interface with thoughtful touches like keyboard shortcuts, personalized workspaces, and accessible design that makes managing your business a pleasure rather than a chore.

bizgenie_advisor.title: BizGenie AI Advisor
bizgenie_advisor.label: AI Advisor
bizgenie_advisor.description: Get strategic business and financial advisory powered by BizGenie, your personalised AI assistant.
bizgenie_advisor.details: Our intelligent assistant analyzes your financial data, market trends, and business operations to offer insightful recommendations. It helps you anticipate market changes, manage risks, and enhance profitability through data-driven strategies tailored to your specific business needs.
